devicePage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_ahsrun
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once field allows the MCU to enter High Speed Run mode (HSRUN).

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_avlp
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once bit allows the MCU to enter any very low power modes: VLPR, VLPW, and VLPS

choice.name: VLPR, VLPW and VLPS are not allowed
VLPR, VLPW and VLPS are allowed

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_alls
binaryOption.toolTip: This write once bit allows the MCU to enter any low leakage stop mode: LLS

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_avlls
binaryOption.description: Allow very low leakage stop mode
binaryOption.toolTip: This write once bit allows the MCU to enter any low leakage stop mode: VLLSx

devicePage.template:
#ifndef SMC_PMPROT_AHSRUN #define SMC_PMPROT_AHSRUN(x) 0 #endif


	// Power Mode Protection Register 	static constexpr uint8_t pmprot = 	 SMC_PMPROT_AHSRUN($(smc_pmprot_ahsrun:0)) | // Allow High Speed Run mode 	 SMC_PMPROT_AVLP($(smc_pmprot_avlp:0)) | // Allow very low power modes 	 SMC_PMPROT_ALLS($(smc_pmprot_alls:0)) | // Allow low leakage stop mode 	 SMC_PMPROT_AVLLS($(smc_pmprot_avlls:0)); // Allow very low leakage stop mode

choiceOption.name: smc_stopctrl_pstopo
choiceOption.toolTip: These bits control whether a Partial Stop mode is entered when STOPM=STOP

choice.name: PSTOP1 - Partial Stop with both system and bus clocks disabled
PSTOP2 - Partial Stop with system clock disabled and bus clock enabled

devicePage.template:
#ifndef SMC_PMCTRL_LPWUI #define SMC_PMCTRL_LPWUI(x) 0 #endif


	// Power Mode Control Register 	static constexpr uint8_t pmctrl = 	 SMC_PMCTRL_LPWUI($(smc_pmctrl_lpwui:0)); // Low Power Wake Up on Interrupt

binaryOption.name: smc_stopctrl_porpo
binaryOption.toolTip: This bit controls whether the POR detect circuit is enabled in VLLS0 mode.

choice.name: POR detect circuit is enabled in VLLS0
POR detect circuit is disabled in VLLS0

choiceOption.name: smc_stopctrl_llsm
choiceOption.toolTip: This field controls which LLS or VLLS sub-mode to enter if STOPM = LLSx or VLLSx

choice.name: VLLS0 if PMCTRL[STOPM]=VLLSx, reserved if PMCTRL[STOPM]=LLSx
VLLS1 if PMCTRL[STOPM]=VLLSx, reserved if PMCTRL[STOPM]=LLSx
VLLS2 if PMCTRL[STOPM]=VLLSx, LLS2 if PMCTRL[STOPM]=LLSx
VLLS3 if PMCTRL[STOPM]=VLLSx, LLS3 if PMCTRL[STOPM]=LLSx
